title: Best of The Herd: 12/02/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/02/2019
description:
Colin explains the one thing the Patriots need to do to become a Super Bowl favorite again. He says Freddie Kitchens wearing a shirt mocking an embarrassing incident for his team and the league is a special kind of dumb. He admits where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Plus, he talks with Fox Sports Radio's Doug Gottlieb about the mess in Cleveland and NFL Network's Jane Slater tells Colin that Jason Garrett may actually be back next season in Dallas.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
